amendment.description: Amendment provides relief from TFR's for an air show in Cleveland, Ohio, which occur simultaneously with games in Cleveland Indians stadium.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 112-46 to provide relief for an air show in Cleveland, Ohio from complying with certain airspace restrictions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
